asyd - (20/01/2009 11:15): jvdrean: hello!  
jvdrean - (20/01/2009 11:15): asyd: hi!  
asyd - (20/01/2009 11:15): jvdrean: sorry to disturb you, how to disable the register ubtton? I look on xwiki.cfg and global preferences (in object edito)  
jvdrean - (20/01/2009 11:16): you must deny the register group to unregistered users in Administration > Rights  
jvdrean - (20/01/2009 11:17): s/the register group/the register right/  
asyd - (20/01/2009 11:17): oh ok, thanks  
asyd - (20/01/2009 11:20): hmm

DSpair - (20/01/2009 14:57): Good morning all...  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 14:58): I'm trying to upgrade from 1.6 to 1.7.1 and I cannot get the schema update to work. I have tried looking for a document to explain what I might be doing wrong, but without luck. Would someone here be able to help?  
asyd - (20/01/2009 15:00): well, start by explain why the schema update, which server, etc  
asyd - (20/01/2009 15:00): s145  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:05): I'm using PostgreSQL. I am upgrading from 1.6 to 1.7.1 and the database schema has changed. I have gone into the xwiki.cfg and enabled the migration options for hibernate based schema updates and it fails.  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:10): Specifically, when I try to load the initial page I get: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: column xwikidocum0\_.xwd\_hidden does not exist  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:11): That is the root exception.  
asyd - (20/01/2009 15:11): have you some messages about the version of storage?  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:11): Would that be in the tomcat logs or the xwiki.log?  
asyd - (20/01/2009 15:12): tomcat logs  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:13): No, I do not see anything there.  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:14): Oh wait, grep to the rescue:  [http-8080-Processor24] INFO  .AbstractXWikiMigrationManager  - No storage migration required since current version is [7351]  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:16): Let me retry by loading a clean copy of the database from backup.  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:19): I've been migrating this database since about 1.2. Is there a way to manually set the db version number in order to force a migration? Would that seriously break anything?  
xwikibot - (20/01/2009 15:34): Design.OfficeConverter was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/OfficeConverter  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 15:35): Woohoo!!! Clean reload fixed the problem. Sorry for the bother!

DSpair - (20/01/2009 16:02): OK, another question. If I wanted to use the SnowBallAnalyzer instead of the StandardAnalyzer in xwiki for the Lucene plugin, how would I accomplish that?  
DSpair - (20/01/2009 16:02): I have tried changing the setting in xwiki.cfg, but that threw an InstantiationException.
